title: Country Life
description: Vegetarian restaurant and natural food shop located a short walk southeast of Vieux Port between Rue Paradis and Rue de Rome. Operating in Marseille since 1987. The restaurant offers a buffet with 6 hot vegan dishes that change daily, and around 18 raw side dishes. The organic shop specializes in vegan and gluten-free products. A Dr. Hauschka beauty institute using organic products also operates on the upper floor. Shop hours Mon-Thur 9am-6:30pm, Fri 9am-3pm.
